sentence: Discussing a plan in which Trump would issue a blanket pardon to co-conspirators in the attempt to overturn the election, Senator Ted Cruz and congressman Jim Jordan among them.
author: Martin Pengelly
title: Roger Stone raged at ‘disgrace’ Trump over failure to overturn election – report

sentence: There are no more Goldwaters in the GOP The select committee reached out to Minority Leader McCarthy and Republican Reps. Scott Perry and Jim Jordan to talk about Jan. 6, but they are not cooperating.
author: EJ Montini
title: 7½-hour phone gap? Did Donald Trump channel Rose Mary Woods on Jan. 6?

sentence: The House Jan. 6 witch hunt committee admitted that Schiff altered a text message from Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) to former Trump chief of staff Mark Meadows, making it appear much more damning than it actually was.
author: Robert Spencer
title: You’ll Never Guess Who Wants to Be Speaker of the House Now
